The men who have reached the final at least four times during the [[History of tennis#Open Era|open era]] are [[Jimmy Connors]], [[BjÃ¶rn Borg]], [[John McEnroe]], [[Boris Becker]], [[Goran IvaniÅ¡eviÄ]], [[Pete Sampras]], [[Roger Federer]] and [[Rafael Nadal]].<ref name=WIMBYMEN>{{cite web|url=http://www.wimbledon.org/en_GB/about/history/rolls/menroll.html|title=History - Rolls of Honour, Men's Singles Finals 1877-2008|author=[[AELTC]]|publisher=[[The Championships, Wimbledon]]|accessdate=2010-02-02}}</ref> Connors reached the final six times between 1974 and 1984 but won only two titles.<ref name=WIMBYMEN/> Borg reached six consecutive finals between 1976 and 1981 and won all but the last final.<ref name=WIMBYMEN/> McEnroe reached five consecutive finals from 1980 through 1984, and won three titles.<ref name=WIMBYMEN/> Becker won three titles out of seven finals between 1985 and 1995.<ref name=WIMBYMEN/> IvaniÅ¡eviÄ reached four finals between 1992 and 2001, and finally won in 2001.<ref name=WIMBYMEN/> Sampras never lost a final, and he took seven titles between 1993 and 2000.<ref name=WIMBYMEN/> Federer appeared in seven consecutive finals from 2003 through 2009, and he won six of them.<ref name=WIMBYMEN/> Nadal has made five consecutive{{ref label|Nadal|A|A}} finals from 2006 to 2011, which he won two of those finals.<ref name=WIMBYMEN/>
The women who have reached the final at least four times during the open era are [[Billie Jean King]], [[Evonne Goolagong Cawley]], [[Chris Evert]], [[Martina Navratilova]], [[Steffi Graf]], [[Venus Williams]], and [[Serena Williams]]. King appeared in three consecutive finals from 1968 through 1970, won only in the 1968 fina, before she took the victory in her last three finals in 1972, 1973, and 1975.<ref name=WIMBYWOMEN>{{cite web|url=http://www.wimbledon.org/en_GB/about/history/rolls/ladiesroll.html|title=History - Rolls of Honour, Ladies' Singles Finals 1877-2008|author=[[AELTC]]|publisher=[[The Championships, Wimbledon]]|accessdate=2010-02-02}}</ref> Goolagong Cawley reached five finals between 1971 and 1980 but won only her first and last finals.<ref name=WIMBYWOMEN/> Evert reached ten finals out of 13 years between 1973 and 1985 but won only three titles.<ref name=WIMBYWOMEN/> Navratilova won nine of her 12 finals between 1978 and 1994.<ref name=WIMBYWOMEN/> Graf reached nine finals between 1987 and 1999, which she won seven times.<ref name=WIMBYWOMEN/> Since 2000, Venus has won the final five times in eight attempts.<ref name=WIMBYWOMEN/> Her sister Serena has appeared in six finals since 2002, which she won four titles.<ref name=WIMBYWOMEN/>
